<x:xmpmeta xmlns:x="adobe:ns:meta/">
  <x:metadata>
    <rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#">
      <rdf:Description rdf:about=""
        xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/"
        xmlns:xmp="http://ns.adobe.com/xap/1.0/">
        <dc:title>Sample GIF</dc:title>
        <dc:creator>kim</dc:creator>
        <dc:subject>Example GIF with XMP metadata</dc:subject>
        <dc:description>This is a sample GIF used to demonstrate XMP metadata embedding.</dc:description>
        <dc:date>2025-04-04</dc:date>
        <xmp:CreatorTool>exiftool</xmp:CreatorTool>
        <xmp:Label>Demo GIF</xmp:Label>
        <xmp:Rights>CC-BY 4.0</xmp:Rights>
      </rdf:Description>
    </rdf:RDF>
  </x:metadata>
</x:xmpmeta>
